title: Severance: Blade of Darkness (Any% Knight, No Physics Glitches) [2:37:47] (RTA)
description: First streamed speedrun of Blade of Darkness with no physics glitches. This game has a very broken any% run on SDA which involves using the broken physics to skip huge sections of every level. I decided to run the game without that stuff. This is my favorite game and I really like running the game without glitching it :D
